results.content: I learned a lot in this course. Definitely got what I was looking for. Keep up the good work Antonio. To be fair in the beginning I was disappointed at the pace Antonio was talking but later on the slow pace helped me to get a good understanding on the subjects. Would not change a thing. Thumps up.

results.content: This course is just what I needed! This course is unique and I have always wanted to learn how to do this. I learned a lot regarding user accesses and docker implementation. The instructor of this course was really responsive and helped me to solve a problem I had.
